text: [Ej pajomʙar] Ojo kasonero nadidi, ki [dar Makka] ʙa onho gufta sud: "[Aknun] Dast az cang ʙardored va namoz ʙarpo dored va zakot ʙipardozed", va [-le] cun [dar Madina] cihod ʙar onon muqarrar sud, on goh guruhe az eson az mardum [-i musriki Makka] tarsidand, monandi tars az Alloh taolo jo [hatto] ʙestar va guftand: "Parvardigoro, caro cihodro ʙar mo muqarrar namudi? Caro ʙa mo to muddati kutohe muhlat nadodi [to az ne'mathoi dunjavi ʙahramand gardem]"? [Ba onon] Bigu: "Barxurdori [az lazzathoi in] dunjo nociz ast va ʙaroi kase, ki parhezkor ʙosad, saroi oxirat ʙehtar ast va [dar on co] kucaktarin sitame ʙa sumo naxohad sud
